channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Government shutdown begins as nation faces new period of uncertainty
item.description: The government shutdown has begun. And it’s plunging the U.S. into a fresh cycle of uncertainty. President Donald Trump and Congress failed to strike an agreement to keep government programs and services running by Wednesday’s deadline.

item.title: What happens now that a government shutdown is underway
How the government shutdown will affect student loans, FAFSA and the Education Dept.
